edited_stories.edited_story_text: We had a lot of work to do at the special event for kids. The adults worked hard to show the kids how to build wooden projects. There were lots of different options for the children to choose from. We showed the kids how to build items like tables. At the end of the day, a presenter gave an informative speech about everything we did that day.
